title: fontforge-mingw encoding problem
content:
Hello!  
I am using fontforge-mingw to design a font, i tryed to encode with latin-1 8859-1, with unicode full 10646-1 and others, but i cannot find the ¿, the ¡, the º, the ª and the \. They dont work in the metrics window too.  
Somebody knows how to resolve this problem?  
thanke you

neus
author: canbum
